message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Would you like to purchase it for $85?
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $85 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm happy to pay $75 for the product.  Let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. Considering your previous offer, I'd like to counter with $80 for the product. This is higher than my initial offer, reflecting its value. Please let me know if this works for you.
